title: Autopsy - Born Undead - 2012 (DVD9)
description:
Source: DVD9
Format: DVD Video
Video kodek: MPEG2
Audio kodek: AC3
Video: NTSC 16:9 (720x480) VBR Auto Letterboxed
Audio:  English (Dolby AC3, 2 ch)
 

Released: 2012
Label: Peaceville / Snapper
Genre: Brutal Death Metal
Total Time: 04:53:22

One of the early breed of US Death Metal acts formed in San Francisco in 1987.
The Born Undead DVD gives an unrivalled insight into the birth, death and rebirth of this legendary band with this extensive documentary. They describe how the beast of Autopsy came to be and the impact the band has had on the metal world over the last 20 years. The DVD also documents the bands return and includes rehearsals and footage from recording sessions. The trio of reunion shows made by the band are also featured.
